ygData.subject: Configure to only crawl pages with a specific scheme

Hi,

is it possible to tell Heritrix e.g. to crawl only a specific scheme 
e.g. https?
I tried to do this with a SURT but to me it looks like it doesnt matter 
if I change the scheme to https one of these to my seeds file.

+https://(tld,domainname, or like this +http://(tld,domainname,

I know I could do this with a custom DecideRule too but I guess there is 
already a builtin way to do this. I just can't find it :)


Thanks,
Markus
